channel.title: Newww
channel.description:
:confused:
Im new to this moparscape and was wondering...
1: what do you do in moparscape? 2: do you need to be online to access it? 3: can you do quests? 4: how do you get money? 5: if you dont need to be online, then can we download the real runescape to play it on our pc's without the internet?
:confused:

item.title: Newww
item.dc:creator: @joshuaj25 joshuaj25
item.description:
@joshuaj25 wrote:

thanks but…
1: how do you get other poeple on your server?
2: how do you spawn money/items?

Read full topic

item.title: Newww
item.dc:creator: @Swift Swift
item.description:
@Swift wrote:

Just answer the guy, it’s not hard.

Im new to this moparscape and was wondering…

1: what do you do in moparscape?
2: do you need to be online to access it?
3: can you do quests?
4: how do you get money?
5: if you dont need to be online, then can we download the real runescape to play it on our pc’s without the internet?

[/quote]

  1. You connect to a server and play Runescape in Moparscape.
  2. You only need to be online if you want other people to join your Runescape game. But if you want to be the only one playing in Runescape, then no, you don’t need internet.
  3. Yes.
  4. Spawn it, or trade with another player and have them give it to you.
  5. Not the real Runescape, but imitations you can download to your PCs.

Read full topic
